title: Safety First
description: The first piece of safety equipment to protect anyone racing go-karts is the helmet Gloves are more of an accessory than an actual piece of go-kart safety equipment, but they can serve multiple purposes. For one, go-karting for younger kids can make them feel like real racecar drivers Chest protectors are another essential piece of racing equipment that you need to have, especially if you are serious about racing.

title: Training
description: We tain you from the basics for the begginers who are enthusiastic towards racing this includes following features one to one training tips to overtake daily practice

title: Championship Events
description: Apart from training we do conduct Championship events depending on the age of the participents and sponcer them further depending on skills and interest we conduct following Championship's Under 12 years Under 18 years Above 18 years

title: Track Rental
description: Have a squad of racers? then this track is your. you can rent the track on hourly bases as well as lap bases you can rent our track from one hour to full day for your personal practice starting from 5 laps or one hour(if hourly bases) as following 5 laps - $50 10 laps - $80 15 laps - $120
